name: JDE->ProcessSalesOrderV5
source:
$includeTemplate('global')
<#compress>
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<ns0:processSalesOrderV5 xmlns:ns0="http://oracle.e1.bssv.JP420000/">
  <header>
    <@inc map "attachmentText"></@inc>
    <#if map["billing"]?? >
      <billing>
		<@inc map.billing "adjustmentScheduleCode"></@inc>
		<#if map.billing["carrier"]?? >
		  <carrier>
		  	<@inc map.billing.carrier "entityId"></@inc>
		  	<@inc map.billing.carrier "entityLongId"></@inc>
		  	<@inc map.billing.carrier "entityTaxId"></@inc>
		  </carrier>
		</#if>  
		<@inc map.billing "checkNumber"></@inc>
		<@inc map.billing "creditCardAccountName"></@inc>
		<@inc map.billing "creditCardAccountNumber"></@inc>
		<@inc map.billing "creditCardTypeCode"></@inc>
		<@inc map.billing "customerPriceGroupCode"></@inc>
		<@inc map.billing "dateExpiration"><!--2008-12-31T23:59:00.000-05:00--></@inc>
		<@inc map.billing "deliveryInstruction1"></@inc>
		<@inc map.billing "deliveryInstruction2"></@inc>
		<@inc map.billing "freightHandlingCode"></@inc>
		<@inc map.billing "paymentInstrumentCode"></@inc>
		<@inc map.billing "paymentTermsCode"></@inc>
		<@inc map.billing "percentDiscountTrade"></@inc>
		<@inc map.billing "printMessageCode"></@inc>
		<@inc map.billing "taxExplanationCode"></@inc>
		<@inc map.billing "taxRateAreaCode"></@inc>
		<@inc map.billing "useTaxedPrices"></@inc>
	  </billing>
	</#if>
    <@inc map "businessUnit"></@inc>
    <@inc map "carrierGLN"></@inc>
    <@inc map "company"></@inc>
    <@inc map "currencyCodeTo"></@inc>
    <@inc map "customerPO"></@inc>
    <@inc map "dateCancel"><!--2008-12-31T23:59:00.000-05:00--></@inc>
    <@inc map "dateOrdered"><!--2008-12-31T23:59:00.000-05:00--></@inc>
    <@inc map "dateRequested"><!--2008-12-31T23:59:00.000-05:00--></@inc>
    <@inc map "dateScheduledPick"><!--2008-12-31T23:59:00.000-05:00--></@inc>
    <#if map["deliverTo"]??>
      <deliverTo>
        <@inc map.deliverTo "entityId"></@inc>
        <@inc map.deliverTo "entityLongId"></@inc>
        <@inc map.deliverTo "entityTaxId"></@inc>
      </deliverTo>
    </#if>	
    <@inc map "deliverToGLN"></@inc>
    <#if map["detail"]??>
      <#list map.detail as detail>
        <detail>
        <@inc detail "agreementId"></@inc>
        <@inc detail "agreementSupplement"></@inc>
        <#if detail["billing"]??>
          <billing>
            <#if detail.billing["carrier"]??>
              <carrier>
              <@inc detail.billing.carrier "entityId"></@inc>
              <@inc detail.billing.carrier "entityLongId"></@inc>
              <@inc detail.billing.carrier "entityTaxId"></@inc>
              </carrier>
            </#if>
            <@inc detail.billing "freightHandlingCode"></@inc>
            <@inc detail.billing "modeOfTransportCode"></@inc>
            <@inc detail.billing "paymentInstrumentCode"></@inc>
            <@inc detail.billing "paymentTermsCode"></@inc>
		    <#if detail.billing["pricing"]??>
		      <pricing>
			  <@inc detail.billing.pricing "adjustmentScheduleCode"></@inc>
			  <!--2008-12-31T23:59:00.000-05:00>-->
			  <@inc detail.billing.pricing "datePriceEffective"></@inc>
			  <@inc detail.billing.pricing "isZeroPriceOverride"></@inc>
			  <@inc detail.billing.pricing "isZeroTaxedPriceOverride"></@inc>
			  <@inc detail.billing.pricing "priceCode1"></@inc>
			  <@inc detail.billing.pricing "priceCode2"></@inc>
			  <@inc detail.billing.pricing "priceCode3"></@inc>
			  <@inc detail.billing.pricing "priceExtendedDomestic"></@inc>
			  <@inc detail.billing.pricing "priceExtendedForeign"></@inc>
			  <@inc detail.billing.pricing "priceUnitDomestic"></@inc>
			  <@inc detail.billing.pricing "priceUnitForeign"></@inc>
			  <@inc detail.billing.pricing "taxedPriceExtendedDomestic"></@inc>
			  <@inc detail.billing.pricing "taxedPriceExtendedForeign"></@inc>
			  <@inc detail.billing.pricing "taxedPriceUnitDomestic"></@inc>
			  <@inc detail.billing.pricing "taxedPriceUnitForeign"></@inc>
			  <@inc detail.billing.pricing "unitOfMeasureCodePricing"></@inc>
			  </pricing>
		    </#if>
		    <@inc detail.billing "printMessageCode"></@inc>
		    <@inc detail.billing "subledger"></@inc>
		    <@inc detail.billing "subledgerTypeCode"></@inc>
		    <@inc detail.billing "taxExplanationCode"></@inc>
		    <@inc detail.billing "taxRateAreaCode"></@inc>
		    <@inc detail.billing "taxableCode"></@inc>
          </billing>
        </#if>
        <@inc detail "businessUnit"></@inc>
        <@inc detail "businessUnitDestination"></@inc>
        <#if detail["categoryCodesPurchasing"]??>
          <categoryCodesPurchasing>
            <@inc detail.categoryCodes "categoryCode001"></@inc>
            <@inc detail.categoryCodes "categoryCode002"></@inc>
            <@inc detail.categoryCodes "categoryCode003"></@inc>
            <@inc detail.categoryCodes "categoryCode004"></@inc>
            <@inc detail.categoryCodes "categoryCode005"></@inc>
          </categoryCodesPurchasing>
        </#if>
        <#if detail["categoryCodesSales"]??>
          <categoryCodesSales>
            <@inc detail.categoryCodesSales "categoryCode001"></@inc>
            <@inc detail.categoryCodesSales "categoryCode002"></@inc>
            <@inc detail.categoryCodesSales "categoryCode003"></@inc>
            <@inc detail.categoryCodesSales "categoryCode004"></@inc>
            <@inc detail.categoryCodesSales "categoryCode005"></@inc>
          </categoryCodesSales>
        </#if>
		<@inc detail "customerPO"></@inc>
		<@inc detail "dateCancel"><!--2008-12-31T23:59:00.000-05:00--></@inc>
		<@inc detail "datePromisedDelivery"><!--2008-12-31T23:59:00.000-05:00--></@inc>
		<@inc detail "datePromisedOriginal"><!--2008-12-31T23:59:00.000-05:00--></@inc>
		<@inc detail "datePromisedShip"><!--2008-12-31T23:59:00.000-05:00--></@inc>
		<@inc detail "dateRequested"><!--2008-12-31T23:59:00.000-05:00--></@inc>
		<@inc detail "dateScheduledPick"><!--2008-12-31T23:59:00.000-05:00--></@inc>
		<@inc detail "documentLineNumber"></@inc>
		<@inc detail "dutyStatusCode"></@inc>
		<@inc detail "endUseCode"></@inc>
		<@inc detail "lineOfBusinessCode"></@inc>
		<@inc detail "lineTypeCode"></@inc>
		<@inc detail "opportunityId"></@inc>        
		<#if detail["originalOrder"]??>
		  <originalOrder>
		    <@inc detail.originalOrder "documentLineNumber"></@inc>
 			<#if detail.originalOrder["originalOrderKey"]??>
 			  <originalOrderKey>
 			  	<@inc detail.originalOrder.originalOrderKey "documentCompany"></@inc>
 			  	<@inc detail.originalOrder.originalOrderKey "documentNumber"></@inc>
 			  	<@inc detail.originalOrder.originalOrderKey "documentTypeCode"></@inc>
 			  </originalOrderKey>
 			</#if>
		  </originalOrder>
		</#if>
		<@inc detail "priorityCode"></@inc>
		<#if detail["processing"]??>
		  <processing>
		    <@inc detail.processing "actionType"></@inc>
		    <@inc detail.processing "useConfigurationRule"></@inc>
		  </processing>
		</#if>  
		<#if detail["product"]??>
		  <product>
		    <#if detail.product["configuration"]??>
		      <#list detail.product.configuration as config>
	            <configuration>
		          <@inc config "businessUnit"></@inc>
		          <@inc config "description1"></@inc>
		          <#if config["item"]??>
		            <item>
		              <@inc config.item "itemCatalog"></@inc>
		              <@inc config.item "itemCustomer"></@inc>
		              <@inc config.item "itemDescription"></@inc>
		              <@inc config.item "itemFreeForm"></@inc>
		              <@inc config.item "itemId"></@inc>
		              <@inc config.item "itemProduct"></@inc>
		              <@inc config.item "itemUOMPrimary"></@inc>
		              <@inc config.item "itemUOMSecondary"></@inc>
		            </item>
		          </#if>
		          <#if config["itemParent"]??>
		            <itemParent>
		              <@inc config.itemParent "itemCatalog"></@inc>
		              <@inc config.itemParent "itemCustomer"></@inc>
		              <@inc config.itemParent "itemDescription"></@inc>
		              <@inc config.itemParent "itemFreeForm"></@inc>
		              <@inc config.itemParent "itemId"></@inc>
		              <@inc config.itemParent "itemProduct"></@inc>
		              <@inc config.itemParent "itemUOMPrimary"></@inc>
		              <@inc config.itemParent "itemUOMSecondary"></@inc>
		            </itemParent>
		          </#if>
		          <@inc config "lineTypeCode"></@inc>
		          <@inc config "quantityComponent"></@inc>
		          <#if config["segment"]??>
		            <#list config.segment as segment>
		              <segment>
		                <@inc segment "segmentNumber"></@inc>
		                <@inc segment "segmentValue"></@inc>
		              </segment>
		            </#list>
		          </#if>
		          <@inc config "unitOfMeasureCodeComponent"></@inc>
		          <@inc config "userAddedComponent"></@inc>
		        </configuration>
		      </#list>
		    </#if>
		    <@inc detail.product "description1"></@inc>
		    <@inc detail.product "description2"></@inc>
		    <#if detail.product["item"]??>
		      <item>
		        <@inc detail.product.item "itemCatalog"></@inc>
		        <@inc detail.product.item "itemCustomer"></@inc>
		        <@inc detail.product.item "itemDescription"></@inc>
		        <@inc detail.product.item "itemFreeForm"></@inc>
		        <@inc detail.product.item "itemId"></@inc>
		        <@inc detail.product.item "itemProduct"></@inc>
		        <@inc detail.product.item "itemUOMPrimary"></@inc>
		        <@inc detail.product.item "itemUOMSecondary"></@inc>
		      </item>
		    </#if>
		    <@inc detail.product "itemVolume"></@inc>
		    <@inc detail.product "itemWeight"></@inc>
		    <@inc detail.product "location"></@inc>
		    <@inc detail.product "lotNumber"></@inc>
		    <@inc detail.product "unitOfMeasureCodeVolume"></@inc>
		    <@inc detail.product "unitOfMeasureCodeWeight"></@inc>
		    </product>
		  </#if>		      
		  <@inc detail "quantityBackOrdered"></@inc>
		  <@inc detail "quantityCanceled"></@inc>
		  <@inc detail "quantityOrdered"></@inc>
		  <@inc detail "quantityShippable"></@inc>
		  <@inc detail "reference"></@inc>
		  <#if detail["relatedOrder"]??>
		    <relatedOrder>
		      <@inc detail.relatedOrder "documentLineNumber"></@inc>
		      <#if detail.relatedOrder["relatedOrderKey"]??>
		        <relatedOrderKey>
		          <@inc detail.relatedOrder.relatedOrderKey "documentCompany"></@inc>
		          <@inc detail.relatedOrder.relatedOrderKey "documentNumber"></@inc>
		          <@inc detail.relatedOrder.relatedOrderKey "documentTypeCode"></@inc>
		        </relatedOrderKey>
		      </#if>
		    </relatedOrder>
		  </#if>
		  <#if detail["shipTo"]??>
		    <shipTo>
		      <@inc detail.shipTo "entityId"></@inc>
		      <@inc detail.shipTo "entityLongId"></@inc>
		      <@inc detail.shipTo "entityTaxId"></@inc>
		    </shipTo>
		  </#if>
		  <@inc detail "statusCodeLast"></@inc>
		  <@inc detail "statusCodeNext"></@inc>
		  <#if detail["supplier"]??>
		    <supplier>
		      <@inc detail.supplier "entityId"></@inc>
		      <@inc detail.supplier "entityLongId"></@inc>
		      <@inc detail.supplier "entityTaxId"></@inc>
		    </supplier>
		  </#if>
		  <@inc detail "timePromisedDelivery"></@inc>		  
		  <@inc detail "timePromisedOriginal"></@inc>		  
		  <@inc detail "timePromisedShip"></@inc>		  
		  <@inc detail "timeRequested"></@inc>		  
		  <@inc detail "timeScheduledPick"></@inc>		  
		  <@inc detail "unitOfMeasureCodeTransaction"></@inc>		  
		  <#if detail["userReservedData"]??>
		    <userReservedData>
		      <@inc detail.userReservedData "userReservedAmount"></@inc>
		      <@inc detail.userReservedData "userReservedCode"></@inc>
		      <!--2008-12-31T23:59:00.000-05:00 -->
		      <@inc detail.userReservedData "userReservedDate"></@inc>
		      <@inc detail.userReservedData "userReservedNumber"></@inc>
		      <@inc detail.userReservedData "userReservedReference"></@inc>
		    </userReservedData>
		  </#if>
	    </detail>
      </#list>
    </#if>
    <@inc map "forwardToGLN"></@inc>
    <#if map["forwardedTo"]??>
	  <forwardedTo>
	    <@inc map.forwardedTo "entityId"></@inc>
		<@inc map.forwardedTo "entityLongId"></@inc>
		<@inc map.forwardedTo "entityTaxId"></@inc>
	  </forwardedTo>
	</#if>
    <@inc map "holdOrderCode"></@inc>
    <@inc map "invoiceToGLN"></@inc>
    <#if map["invoicedTo"]??>
	  <invoicedTo>
	    <@inc map.invoicedTo "entityId"></@inc>
		<@inc map.invoicedTo "entityLongId"></@inc>
		<@inc map.invoicedTo "entityTaxId"></@inc>
	  </invoicedTo>
	</#if>    
    <@inc map "opportunityId"></@inc>
    <@inc map "orderTakenBy"></@inc>    
    <@inc map "orderedBy"></@inc>
    <#if map["paidBy"]??>
	  <paidBy>
	    <@inc map.paidBy "entityId"></@inc>
		<@inc map.paidBy "entityLongId"></@inc>
		<@inc map.paidBy "entityTaxId"></@inc>
	  </paidBy>
	</#if>   
	<@inc map "paidByGLN"></@inc>    
    <#if map["processing"]??>
	  <processing>
	    <@inc map.processing "actionType"></@inc>
		<@inc map.processing "processingVersion"></@inc>
	  </processing>
	</#if> 	
	<@inc map "rateExchange"></@inc>
    <#if map["salesOrderKey"]??>
      <salesOrderKey>
	    <@inc map.salesOrderKey "documentCompany"></@inc>
		<@inc map.salesOrderKey "documentNumber"></@inc>
		<@inc map.salesOrderKey "documentTypeCode"></@inc>
	  </salesOrderKey>
	</#if>	
    <#if map["shipTo"]??>
	  <shipTo>
	    <@inc map.shipTo "addressLine1"></@inc>
	    <@inc map.shipTo "addressLine2"></@inc>
	    <@inc map.shipTo "addressLine3"></@inc>
	    <@inc map.shipTo "addressLine4"></@inc>
	    <@inc map.shipTo "city"></@inc>
	    <@inc map.shipTo "countryCode"></@inc>
	    <@inc map.shipTo "countyCode"></@inc>
        <#if map.shipTo["customer"]??>
          <customer>
            <@inc map.shipTo.customer "entityId"></@inc>
            <@inc map.shipTo.customer "entityLongId"></@inc>
            <@inc map.shipTo.customer "entityTaxId"></@inc>
          </customer>
        </#if>
        <@inc map.shipTo "customerGLN"></@inc>
        <@inc map.shipTo "mailingName"></@inc>
        <@inc map.shipTo "postalCode"></@inc>
        <@inc map.shipTo "stateCode"></@inc>
      </shipTo>
	</#if>	
    <#if map["soldTo"]??>
	  <shipTo>
	    <@inc map.soldTo "addressLine1"></@inc>
	    <@inc map.soldTo "addressLine2"></@inc>
	    <@inc map.soldTo "addressLine3"></@inc>
	    <@inc map.soldTo "addressLine4"></@inc>
	    <@inc map.soldTo "city"></@inc>
	    <@inc map.soldTo "countryCode"></@inc>
	    <@inc map.soldTo "countyCode"></@inc>
        <#if map.soldTo["customer"]??>
          <customer>
            <@inc map.soldTo.customer "entityId"></@inc>
            <@inc map.soldTo.customer "entityLongId"></@inc>
            <@inc map.soldTo.customer "entityTaxId"></@inc>
          </customer>
        </#if>
        <@inc map.soldTo "customerGLN"></@inc>
        <@inc map.soldTo "mailingName"></@inc>
        <@inc map.soldTo "postalCode"></@inc>
        <@inc map.soldTo "stateCode"></@inc>
      </shipTo>
	</#if>	
	<@inc map "timeRequested"></@inc>
	<@inc map "timeScheduledPick"></@inc>
	<#if map["userReservedData"]??>
	  <userReservedData>
	  <@inc map.userReservedData "userReservedAmount"></@inc>
	  <@inc map.userReservedData "userReservedCode"></@inc>
	  <@inc map.userReservedData "userReservedDate"></@inc>
	  <@inc map.userReservedData "userReservedNumber"></@inc>
	  <@inc map.userReservedData "userReservedReference"></@inc>	  
	  </userReservedData>
	</#if>
  </header>
</ns0:processSalesOrderV5>    
</#compress>
